description: RSS exclusive and the international posterhunk for musclebears,Turkish superstar Huessein, and rising Canadian megastar, thesmokin hot Brendan Davies, come together in what could be thegreatest piece of footage Centurion has ever released. A newlexicon of superlatives will have to be written to aptly convey themajesty, power, passion and intensity of this simultaneously filthy andtender porn masterpiece. Viewing the previous works of either ofthese sleazy Olympians will not prepare you for what they manifest inthis apex of gay eros. Every position, every move, every wordpresented in real time precisely as it occurred. Trancendent in its nearmystical power, this is a glimpse into these men's very souls and it willhaunt the viewers for years to come.
title: Centurion Muscle 4 - Erotikus, Scene #04
